lead_paragraph: Mike Cammalleri had a goal and two assists, and Schneider, a goaltender who spent three seasons with Vancouver, made 36 saves to help the Devils stop a two-game skid.

headline.main: Devils Edge Canucks as Cory Schneider Beats His Former Team
headline.print_headline: Devils Edge Canucks as Cory Schneider Beats His Former Team

snippet: Mike Cammalleri had a goal and two assists, and Schneider, a goaltender who spent three seasons with Vancouver, made 36 saves to help the Devils stop a two-game skid.
